column4: where would i put a bash script so i can run it from any directory?
you probably don't want to install it manually but use apt instead.  But if you really think you know best, use ~/.mozilla/plugins/
i installed flashplugin-installer but flash still not working in firefox for 64 bit ubuntu
nvm i got it, had to restart firefox twice for some reason
you would need to open a terminal that ran vim inside
so i cant do it then? ok
you can, just see gnome-terminal's options (you can run a command)
yeah, I told you how to do this before...
ok well maybe it's just a setting that I need to poke around in, thanks.
it means the same thing it meant 20 minutes ago when Losha pointed you to « man chmod » for a detailed explanation
you got me confused with someone else, losha never told me to 'man chmod'
opologies, your names were the same length and had the same letters :)
